Luxury Appliance Repair in Calabasas, CA

Five-Star Service for the Most Elegant Kitchens in the West Valley

In Calabasas, luxury is a lifestyle—where every element of the home, from designer interiors to high-end appliances, reflects comfort, class, and intentional living. Whether you’re in The Oaks, Hidden Hills, or a private hillside estate, your appliances play a vital role in maintaining the beauty and functionality of your daily life.

At Luxury Appliance Repair by Zaricci, we specialize in high-end appliance repair in Calabasas, bringing factory-trained expertise, genuine parts, and white-glove service to the heart of your kitchen or laundry room. We service elite brands like Sub-Zero, Wolf, Thermador, Miele, Viking, Gaggenau, La Cornue, and more.

🔧 Why Calabasas Homeowners Choose ZARICCI

  • ✅ Certified in All Premium Brands
    Your luxury appliance deserves a technician who understands it inside and out. Our team is trained and certified in the world’s leading brands—ensuring fast, accurate repairs with zero guesswork.
  • ✅ OEM Parts Only
    We use authentic manufacturer-approved parts to protect your appliance’s warranty, functionality, and elegant finish.
  • ✅ Discreet, Same-Day or Next-Day Service
    We offer fast appointments in Calabasas, arrive on time, and work respectfully in your space with total professionalism.
  • ✅ White-Glove Experience, Always
    From boot covers to spotless cleanup, we ensure every repair is seamless and stress-free—for you and your home.

Our technicians understand what it takes to service these sophisticated systems. 🛠️ What We Repair in Calabasas

❄️ Luxury Refrigeration

  • Sub-Zero, Thermador, Miele
  • Temperature fluctuations or frost buildup
  • Ice maker or water line malfunctions
  • Door seal or compressor problems

🔥 Ranges, Ovens & Cooktops

  • Wolf, Gaggenau, La Cornue, Viking
  • Igniters not sparking
  • Uneven cooking or oven not heating
  • Touchscreen, smart feature, or self-cleaning issues

🚿 High-End Dishwashers

  • Miele, Bosch, Cove
  • Not draining or starting
  • Poor cleaning or drying performance
  • Control panel or display failure

🧺 Luxury Washers & Dryers

  • Miele, LG Signature, Fisher & Paykel
  • Drum not spinning or draining
  • Smart sensors malfunctioning
  • Dryer not heating or overheating

☕ Built-In & Specialty Units

  • Wine coolers, espresso machines, steam ovens
  • Inconsistent temps, motor failure, power issues
  • Smart integration errors
  • Part replacements or integration refinements

👨‍🔧 Our Luxury Repair Process

  1. Book Your Appointment
    Call or schedule online. We’ll confirm your details and send a technician trained in your brand.
  2. On-Site Diagnosis
    A certified ZARICCI technician arrives on time and performs a complete inspection of the issue.
  3. Transparent Estimate
    We walk you through the issue and provide a clear, detailed quote before any work begins.
  4. Precision Repair Using OEM Parts
    We perform the repair using genuine parts and test for full function and efficiency.
  5. Clean-Up & Warranty Protection
    We leave your space spotless, and all work is backed by a satisfaction guarantee.
